Title: Pokiri
Writer: Puri Jagannadh (dialogue), Puri Jagannadh (screenplay), Puri Jagannadh (story), Meher Ramesh (script associate)
Actors: Mahesh Babu, Ileana D'Cruz, Prakash Raj, Nassar
Plot: A street killer has another identity and intention for joining a underworld gang of the city which he is hiding and when it exposes everything turns upside down
